verbs.description: It [V: ’s] [ARG2: hard] [ARG1: to know which is accelerating faster , the melting of Antarctic ice or the Trump administration ’s disdain for the planet] .
It ’s hard to [V: know] [ARG1: which is accelerating faster , the melting of Antarctic ice or the Trump administration ’s disdain for the planet] .
It ’s hard to know which [V: is] accelerating faster , the melting of Antarctic ice or the Trump administration ’s disdain for the planet .
It ’s hard to know [ARG1: which] is [V: accelerating] [ARGM-MNR: faster] , the melting of Antarctic ice or the Trump administration ’s disdain for the planet .
